channel.title: How do i change the ip on my 508 client
channel.description:
i got told it was something to do with an ip changer that i can download or something but i cant seem to find anything i have gone into my files and changed it from 127.0.0.1 or w.e it was but it still connects to 127.0.0.1
any ideas? i appologise if this is in the wrong place im kinda new to the forums ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ edit sorry about double post i didnt think it went up internet is being a noob today and someone please help
p.s mwuahah to whoever keeps locking my posts who obviously has taken a disliking 2 me :mad: i wrote this in such a way that im not making a request but most of the pople will tell me what i want :D

item.title: How do i change the ip on my 508 client
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

Prima:

In client.java, search for ‘127.0.0.1’. Replace that with the Ip you want the client to connect to.

or if thats not there, search for the server name/former i.p

Read full topic
